SubmitVideoTranslateJob.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: vclm.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: SubmitVideoTranslateJob
<公共请求参数>



{
    "VideoUrl": "https://xxx.com/url/xxx.mp4",
    "SrcLang": "zh",
    "DstLang": "zh",
    "Confirm": 0,
    "LipSync": 0
}
